mapper.select: SELECT WIDGET_ID AS widgetId, WIDGET_NM AS widgetNm, WIDGET_TY_CODE AS widgetTyCode, WIDGET_CN AS widgetCn, USE_AT AS useAt, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm FROM CMS_WIDGET WHERE WIDGET_ID = #{widgetId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMS_WIDGET ( WIDGET_ID, WIDGET_NM, WIDGET_TY_CODE, WIDGET_CN, USE_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #{widgetId}, #{widgetNm}, #{widgetTyCode}, #{widgetCn}, #{useAt}, NOW() )
